title: Custom Description Component
description:
This versatile schema harnesses the power of Markdown, enabling diverse text formatting possibilities. It supports:

- *Italic*, **bold**, and ***combined emphasis*** for dynamic emphasis.
- Various heading sizes (#, ##, ###) for organized structuring.
- Lists (both ordered and unordered) for itemization.
- [Hyperlinks](https://www.example.com) to seamlessly embed URLs.
- `Inline code` and code blocks for technical content.
- > Blockquotes for emphasized excerpts or citations.
- Tables for organized data representation.
- ![Images](https://www.example.com/image.jpg) with alt text for visual content.
